content: अध्यवसानं [भावे-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Effort, determination &c. See अध्यवसाय. {@--2@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Identification of two things (प्रकृत and अप्रकृत) in such a manner that the one is completely absorbed into the other; निगीर्याध्यवसानं तु प्रकृतस्य परेण यत् <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; on such identification is founded the figure called अतिशयोक्ति, and the लक्षणा called साध्यवसाना. See <ls>K. P. 2.</ls>
